name: Dashboard
description: Represents a dashboard, which is a visual representation of key business metrics and performance indicators.
summary:
The `Dashboard` object in Salesforce has the following attributes:

1. **Identifiers and Status**:
   - `Id` (ID): Unique identifier for the dashboard.
   - `IsDeleted` (Boolean): Indicates whether the dashboard is deleted.

2. **Folder Information**:
   - `FolderId` (Reference): ID of the folder containing the dashboard.
   - `FolderName` (String): Name of the folder containing the dashboard.

3. **Dashboard Details**:
   - `Title` (String): Title of the dashboard.
   - `DeveloperName` (String): API name of the dashboard.
   - `NamespacePrefix` (String): Namespace prefix for the dashboard.
   - `Description` (String): Description of the dashboard.

4. **Layout Sizes**:
   - `LeftSize`, `MiddleSize`, `RightSize` (Picklist): Sizes of the left, middle, and right sections of the dashboard.

5. **Timestamps**:
   - `CreatedDate` (DateTime): Date and time when the dashboard was created.
   - `CreatedById` (Reference): ID of the user who created the dashboard.
   - `LastModifiedDate` (DateTime): Date and time when the dashboard was last modified.
   - `LastModifiedById` (Reference): ID of the user who last modified the dashboard.
   - `SystemModstamp` (DateTime): System timestamp for the last modification.
   - `LastViewedDate`, `LastReferencedDate` (DateTime): Dates when the dashboard was last viewed or referenced.

6. **User and Display Settings**:
   - `RunningUserId` (Reference): ID of the user running the dashboard.
   - `TitleColor`, `TitleSize`, `TextColor` (Integer): Color and size settings for the title and text.
   - `BackgroundStart`, `BackgroundEnd` (Integer): Start and end colors for the background gradient.
   - `BackgroundDirection` (Picklist): Direction of the background gradient.

7. **Dashboard Type and Theme**:
   - `Type` (Picklist): Type of the dashboard.
   - `ColorPalette`, `ChartTheme` (Picklist): Color palette and chart theme used in the dashboard.

8. **Dashboard Result Information**:
   - `DashboardResultRefreshedDate` (String): Date when the dashboard results were last refreshed.
   - `DashboardResultRunningUser` (String): User who ran the dashboard to get the results.

These attributes define the structure, appearance, and metadata of a dashboard in Salesforce.
label: Dashboard
